description: Gmail API component for interacting with Gmail services.

inputs.name: recipient_email
inputs.info: Email address of the recipient

inputs.name: subject
inputs.info: Subject of the email

inputs.name: body
inputs.info: Content of the email

inputs.name: cc
inputs.info: Email addresses to CC (Carbon Copy) in the email, separated by commas

inputs.name: bcc
inputs.info: Email addresses to BCC (Blind Carbon Copy) in the email, separated by commas

inputs.name: is_html
inputs.info: Specify whether the email body contains HTML content (true/false)

inputs.name: gmail_user_id
inputs.info: The user's email address or 'me' for the authenticated user

inputs.name: max_results
inputs.info: Maximum number of emails to be returned

inputs.name: message_id
inputs.info: The ID of the specific email message

inputs.name: thread_id
inputs.info: The ID of the email thread

inputs.name: query
inputs.info: Search query to filter emails (e.g., 'from:someone@email.com' or 'subject:hello')

inputs.name: message_body
inputs.info: The body content of the message to be sent

inputs.name: label_name
inputs.info: Name of the Gmail label to create, modify, or filter by

inputs.name: label_id
inputs.info: The ID of the Gmail label

inputs.name: label_ids
inputs.info: Comma-separated list of label IDs to filter messages

inputs.name: label_list_visibility
inputs.info: The visibility of the label in the label list in the Gmail web interface

inputs.name: message_list_visibility
inputs.info: The visibility of the label in the message list in the Gmail web interface

inputs.name: page_token
inputs.info: Token for retrieving the next page of results

inputs.name: include_spam_trash
inputs.info: Include messages from SPAM and TRASH in the results

inputs.name: format
inputs.info: The format to return the message in. Possible values: minimal, full, raw, metadata

inputs.name: resource_name
inputs.info: The resource name of the person to provide information about

inputs.name: person_fields
inputs.info: Fields to return for the person. Multiple fields can be specified by separating them with commas

inputs.name: attachment_id
inputs.info: Id of the attachment

inputs.name: file_name
inputs.info: File name of the attachment file

inputs.name: attachment
inputs.info: Add an attachment
